Question.Subject: When Lockerz re-stocks how long until they run out?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Well I think Lockerz is a scam....but when they do restock the prizes last about 30 seconds and then are gone. It is very hard to win anything.
But just a suggestion is to try swagbucks. Swagbucks is very legit. Ive made over $100 in amazon.com gift cards. Its a search engine just like google, but you randomly win swagbucks every day for searching and entering swagcodes. Try it out- http://www.swagbucks.com/refer/Goaliekid97
